summary: Frontend-only testing for Quantum DAO Expo/React Native web app. All core features tested: landing page, wallet connection button, tab navigation, and all page rendering. The Connect Phantom button successfully triggers the wallet connection popup flow. No JavaScript errors found.

issues: props.pointerEvents is deprecated. Use style.pointerEvents (non-blocking warning)
Image: style.resizeMode is deprecated. Please use props.resizeMode (non-blocking warning)

action_items: Minor: Consider updating deprecated pointerEvents and resizeMode usage to eliminate console warnings
critical_code_review_comments: MOCKED: Token price is hardcoded at $2.50 USD in /app/frontend/utils/solanaRpc.ts (QUANTUM_PRICE_USD = 2.5)
Code quality is good - proper error handling in WalletContext.tsx with lazy-loading of crypto libraries
Missing data-testid attributes on interactive elements for easier automated testing
test_credentials: No credentials needed - wallet connection requires real Phantom wallet browser extension
seed_data_creation: None - app uses mock data for opportunities
context_for_next_testing_agent: All UI pages load correctly. The wallet connection flow works - clicking 'Connect Phantom' opens a popup to phantom.app. Cannot test actual wallet connection without a real Phantom wallet extension. The app uses Expo Router for navigation with 5 tabs: Portfolio, Invest, Pre-Sale, Referral, Account. Filter chips on Opportunities page work correctly.

landing_page.details: QUANTUM branding, feature cards, Access Platform button all visible and working

portfolio_page.details: Shows disconnected state with 'Connect Wallet' and 'Connect Phantom' button. Button click triggers wallet popup successfully.

opportunities_page.details: Filter chips (All, Open, Closed, Funded) work correctly. Opportunity cards display with voting progress bars. Navigation to detail page works.

presale_page.details: Form renders with all fields: First Name, Last Name, Email, Solana Wallet, QUANTUM Tokens. Payment methods (Card, Crypto) selectable. Token Price $2.5, Min Purchase 100 QTM displayed.

referral_page.details: Shows disconnected state with 'Connect Wallet' message asking to connect wallet to access referral dashboard.

account_page.details: Shows disconnected state with 'No Wallet Connected' message and Connect Wallet button.

tab_navigation.details: All 5 tabs (Portfolio, Invest, Pre-Sale, Referral, Account) navigate correctly.

wallet_connection_flow.details: Connect Phantom button click loads crypto libraries (tweetnacl, bs58) and opens Phantom popup. Console shows: '[Crypto] tweetnacl loaded', '[Crypto] bs58 loaded, encode exists: function', '[Wallet] Opening Phantom popup...'
